metadata.title: CVE-2024-45492 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in libexpat before 2.6.3. nextScaffoldPart inxmlparse.c can have an integer overflow for m_groupSize on 32-bit platforms(where UINT_MAX equals SIZE_MAX).

criterions.comment: expat package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
xmlrpc-c package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
